Need help with Import API
Trying to inport file and dies with error message - "invalid media type"
Are you able to Import single file? I'm having issues, would you be able to help or share your views?
HubSpot:

HubSpot: You need to improve your Import API. That does not work even with postman. I have searched google and every one is having problem with it. Best thing is to develope functionality: 1) drop file on hub 2) create job on hub gui with mapping field between csv file and list. 3) user can schedule this job to run at desired intervals 4) send success/fail report of job execution to user. 5) user can go and look at job for any errors.

Hello all good morning, Im new to the group (and in APIs actually, I was assigned this task in my company)

I have a basic question, we have a proprietary  tool in my company (lets refer to it as BDB), and from what I can see, the Deals made from HubSpot can be moved over to BDB without any issues, that API is ok (information and data entered in HS populates correctly in BDB). My question is, is it possible to put any new data/info in the BDB and have that reflected in HS? The previous IT we worked with says that the HS-BDB API only flows one way, and does not work both ways.

Hello Patrick, from what your IT said no. It sounds like HubSpot is either sending the information or BDB is pulling the information. But you may have luck asking the person or people who built the tool to see if is possible to send the information to HubSpot. If BDB can send the information HubSpot can receive the information.

From what I remember, HS is sending the information to BDB.
Does HS allow information to be sent to it? I was thinking that maybe HS has restrictions or like security firewalls  to protect against 3rd party programs sending data to the HubSpot program/ platform
Why not set up a workflow with a trigger when the desired call happens to send a webhook action?

HubSpot allows information to be sent to it via API. All that BDB would need to be able to do is send the information in a format that HubSpot likes. I would recommend checking out HubSpot academy for more information. Additionally, this may be a helpful resource for you. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/overview>

This outlines all the information on how to send the information to HubSpot.
nice. thank you sir!!

Reminder: *Want to be the first to know when a new API is available or an existing API has a new version?*  We publish all of that on our <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog|Developer Changelog>.  While we do our best to avoid <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/breaking-change-definition|breaking changes> to our APIs, sometimes for security, and reliability we have to. The Changelog is where we’ll post announcements ahead of time about it. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog|Subscribe to the Developer Changelog> to stay up-to-date on what’s happening in the world of HubSpot development.

Hi all! Quick question, and not sure if this is the right place - We have a client that is trying to access the email (subscriptions) preference page remotely via a url that they can pass to their contact, or update for them if they have called into their call center. Any suggestions on options here? I appreciate any/all ideas!

Hi, I don't know if this is the correct channel or if you could tell me the best place? I have an application on HubSpot working perfectly with almost all of our clients, but only 1 specific account is facing problems with the OAuth Token, where after a while the data we negotiate is no longer valid, returning the error BAD_REFRESH_TOKEN (missing or invalid refresh token) when getting for a new Token with RefreshToken. Does anyone have any ideas on possible scenarios that could lead to this problem?

hi there I have a question on updating lifecycle stages. I am unable to set a lifecycle stage backwards for contacts via the REST api patch requests. The docs say that this property can only be moved forward unless it is cleared first. How would I clear this property programmatically via the api? I have tried setting it to the first stage in the lifecycle but no dice.

Is it possible there is a measurable delay between the time an object is created via API (Company in my case) and when that new company would be returned in a search? I’m seeing some evidence of this.

it looks like my pretty straight forward search is returning duplicate results with slightly different "scores". Is there any way to adjust for that? This seems like a bug more than anything else but I'm not 100% sure
